alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Coweta; DeKalb; Fayette; Henry; Meriwether; Pike; Rockdale; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 4:14AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Spalding, Rockdale, southern DeKalb, Fayette, Meriwether, Pike, Henry, southeastern Coweta and Clayton Counties through 445 AM EST... At 414 AM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from East Lake to Peachtree City to near Louise, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Griffin, McDonough, Decatur, Fayetteville, Conyers, Jonesboro, Zebulon, Greenville, Peachtree City, Stockbridge, Forest Park, Riverdale, College Park, Hampton, Morrow, Lovejoy, Hapeville, Locust Grove and Senoia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; Coweta; DeKalb; Fayette; Henry; Meriwether; Pike; Rockdale; Spalding
